item.title: SWN
item.description: score:356 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases have positively impacted Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, which could benefit companies like Chesapeake Energy and Cherniere Energy. Southwestern Energy delivered earnings and revenue surprises, indicating a strong performance in the quarter ended December 2023.
